title: Exclusive: Castle Books Once Upon a Time's Blackbeard for Guest Spot
content: Castle  is apparently looking for a pirate's expertise for an upcoming heist episode. The ABC drama has cast Charles Mesure , who most recently played Blackbeard on Once Upon a Time , for a guest-starring role, TVGuide.com has learned exclusively. Mesure will play Liam Hollister, a high-stakes transporter of priceless items who gets in over his head with a heist gone bad. Fall Preview: Get scoop on Castle and more of your favorite returning shows Besides his role on Once, Mesure has had memorable turns as Ben Faulkner on Desperate Housewives , Kyle Hobbes on V , and J.D. Pollock on Crossing Jordan . His most recent TV credit was an arc on Bravo's Girlfriends' Guide to Divorce . Mesure will appear in an episode titled "The Nose," the fifth episode of Castle 's eighth season, which premieres Monday, Sept. 21 at 10/9c on ABC. Other Links From TVGuide.com
